Package bayes

Class NaiveBayesClassifier

java.lang.Object
bayes.NaiveBayesClassifier
public class NaiveBayesClassifier
extends java.lang.Object
In the NaiveBayesClassifier class we go through each Instance of the Test File and compute the joint probability P_B. Depending on the value of this probability, a prediction is done for the Class Variable of that instance. Later all the predictions are compared with the real values in the Test Set and an accuracy for the TANBC is created. Other requested evaluation metrics are also computed in this class.
